title: Stage Lv6-P4-S23
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Even though he was inexperienced, he managed the task well.
I enjoy the job, whereas my friend finds it tedious.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 경험이 없었음에도 불구하고 그는 업무를 잘 처리했습니다.
sentences.en: Even though he was inexperienced, he managed the task well.

sentences.kr: 저는 이 일을 즐기는 반면, 제 친구는 지루하다고 생각합니다.
sentences.en: I enjoy the job, whereas my friend finds it tedious.

sentences.kr: 비용이 많이 들었음에도 불구하고 프로젝트는 훌륭한 결과를 가져왔습니다.
sentences.en: Despite being costly, the project delivered excellent results.
Although there were challenges, the team achieved its goals.

sentences.kr: 시장이 불안정한 상황인 반면, 우리 회사는 성장하고 있습니다.
sentences.en: The market is unstable, whereas our company is growing.

sentences.kr: 예산이 제한적임에도 불구하고 모든 목표를 달성했습니다.
sentences.en: Even though the budget was limited, we achieved all objectives.

sentences.kr: 경쟁이 치열한 반면, 우리는 차별화된 전략을 가지고 있습니다.
sentences.en: Competition is fierce, whereas we have a differentiated strategy.

sentences.kr: 시간이 촉박했음에도 불구하고 품질을 타협하지 않았습니다.
sentences.en: Despite the tight schedule, we didn't compromise on quality.
